name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Dynamic Senior Sales Engineer with a strong foundation in business development and customer relationship management, leveraging 13+ years of technical expertise to drive sales success. Proficient in using **CRM** platforms and proposal tools to streamline processes and enhance client engagement. Skilled in project management and effective communication, ensuring alignment with customer needs and project timelines.
Previously held a robust technical background as a Full Stack Developer, adept in languages such as **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and frameworks like **React**, **Node.js**, and **Django**. Experienced in delivering AI/ML-powered applications, supporting real-time processing and predictive analytics. Familiar with cloud native deployments on **AWS** and **Azure**, as well as implementing CI/CD pipelines and microservices architectures. This technical acumen complements my ability to address complex customer challenges in water treatment, filtration, and wastewater management.
